arts.ttl: Daily Schmankerl: The aftermath of Bayern Munich vs. Feyenoord; Bayern’s Daniel Peretz spurned multiple offers; Manchester City, Real Madrid tracking Florian Wirtz; Jack Grealish to Borussia Dortmund?; Manchester United’s Ruben Amorim unravels; and MORE!
arts.sum: While Bayern Munich is expected to be among the teams attempting to sign Wirtz, Manchester City and Real Madrid are expected to join the Bavarians: Bayern Munich had flashes of second half passion and urgency, but Feyenoord was just better and wanted the game more...and it was evident.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich boss Vincent Kompany blames entire team for Feyenoord’s game winning goal
arts.sum: For the third time this season, Bayern Munich conceded three goals in a match. Kim’s poorly timed leap took him out of the play and Giménez buried his 1v1 with Manuel Neuer.

arts.ttl: Champions League Player Ratings Poll: Feyenoord 3 - 0 Bayern Munich
arts.sum: For now, here’s how German outlets Bild and kicker rated the Bayern performances. Player ratings [ @BILD ] pic.twitter.com/bHeVvrqa5Q

arts.ttl: “We are NOT a top team” — Joshua Kimmich critical of Bayern Munich after 3-0 Feyenoord debacle
arts.sum: Bayern Munich got whacked 3-0 by Feyenoord in the Champions League, a team with no fit midfielders whose last match was a 1-1 draw with Willem II who sits 12 th in the Eredivisie. Kimmich lamented the plethora of wasted chances and his team’s sloppiness.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works — Postgame Show: Feyenoord 3-0 Bayern Munich (Champions League)
arts.sum: Bayern Munich traveled to Amsterdam to face off with Feyenoord and while the Bavarians were not exactly given a warm reception, the visitors certainly did not make themselves at home either in a stunning 3-0 defeat. Bayern Munich looked confused and lethargic at times to start things off.

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munich’s appalling 3-0 defeat to Feyenoord in the Champions League
arts.sum: This was a game Bayern simply couldn’t afford to lose, and yet here we are. Giménez was definitely the best attacker on the pitch tonight.

arts.ttl: Santiago Gimenez Lionel Messi and Neymar on Exclusive Champions League List
arts.sum: Santiago Gimenez's brace vs. Bayern Munich put him alongside Lionel Messi, Neymar Jr. and Raphinha on an exclusive Champions League list.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich at a loss to explain Champions League struggles
arts.sum: Flying in the Bundesliga, Bayern Munich is stuttering in the Champions League. It dropped to 15th in the 36-team Champions League table and will need to beat Slovan Bratislava in its final first-round game next week to keep alive any hope of finishing among the top eight to avoid a playoff.

arts.ttl: Four Observations from Bayern Munich’s 3-0 loss to Feyenoord
arts.sum: Feyenoord are undoubtedly a team with talent, but the way Bayern performed and lost this game was truly disappointing. Bayern Munich made 30 attempts on net without scoring a single goal.

arts.ttl: Feyenoord shock Bayern in comprehensive win
arts.sum: Bayern Munich's hopes of qualifying directly to the Champions League last 16 are dealt a blow as they are stunned by Feyenoord in Rotterdam.
